This test checks text editor indent autodetection functionality

--------------TEST 1--------------
function foo() {
        return 42;
}
--------------TEST 2--------------
console.log("Hello!");
--------------TEST 3--------------
/**
 * This is a header comment that spans
 * for a lot of lines
 *
 *
 *
 *
 *
 *
 *
 *
 *
 *
 *
 *
 *
 *
 *
 */
function foo() {
  return 42;
}
--------------TEST 4--------------
function MyClass()
{
    this._foo = "bar";
}

MyClass.prototype = {
    method1: function()
    {
        var sum = 0;
        for(var i = 0; i < 100; ++i) {
            sum += i;
        }
        return sum;
    },

    method2: function()
    {
        while(true) {
            break;
        }
    },
}
--------------TEST 5--------------
  a
  a
    b
    b
    b
c
c
--------------TEST 6--------------
	tab
		tab
	tab
	tab
--------------TEST 7-------------- (empty content)
--------------TEST 8--------------
function foo() {
  var i = 0;
  function bar() {
    var a = [];
    a.push(1);
    a.push(12);
    a.push(42);
    a.push(44);
    return a.join("!");
  }

  (function() {
    var a = {
      a: function() {
        vbr b = [];
        b.push(1);
        b.push(12);
        b.push(42);
        b.push(44);
        b.push(44 * 2);
        return b.join("?");
      }
    };
  })();
}
Tests number: 8

Running: 
Autodetected indentation for test1: 8 spaces

Running: 
Autodetected indentation for test2: 4 spaces

Running: 
Autodetected indentation for test3: 2 spaces

Running: 
Autodetected indentation for test4: 4 spaces

Running: 
Autodetected indentation for test5: 2 spaces

Running: 
Autodetected indentation for test6: Tab

Running: 
Autodetected indentation for test7: 4 spaces

Running: 
Autodetected indentation for test8: 2 spaces
